trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>未设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件将使用内置的默认图像 （20 x 20 像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Some visual designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, provide tools to generate the line images.
trans-unit.target: 某些可视化设计器，如 Microsoft Visual Studio 提供生成的行映像的工具。

trans-unit.source: The run time does not flip custom images for right-to-left displays.
trans-unit.target: 运行的时不能翻转右到左显示的自定义的映像。

trans-unit.source: To support both left-to-right and right-to-left Web pages, you must create image sets for both directions.
trans-unit.target: 若要支持从左到右和从右到左的网页，你必须创建两个方向的映像集。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> property to specify the folder that contains the line images to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>属性，以指定包含要在中显示的线条图像的文件夹<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: To work with this example, use the Line Designer tool beforehand to create a set of line images.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，使用行设计器工具事先创建一组行映像。

trans-unit.source: Place them in a folder named LineImages within the directory for the sample application.
trans-unit.target: 将它们放在名为示例应用程序目录中 LineImages 文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的主要标识符。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: 所有传入名称值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Processes postback data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 处理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件的回发数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control's state changes as a result of the postback event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件的状态由于回发事件而发生更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LoadPostData%2A> method call, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method on those controls.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 页框架跟踪返回的所有服务器控件`true`从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LoadPostData%2A>方法调用，并调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>这些控件上的方法。

trans-unit.source: A object that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含为该控件保存的视图状态值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of tree levels to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要绑定到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件的最大树级别数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of tree levels to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件的最大树级别数。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which binds all the tree levels in the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 -1，这会将数据源中的所有树级别绑定到该控件。

trans-unit.source: When binding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A> property to limit the number of tree levels to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 在绑定时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件添加到数据源，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A>属性可限制要绑定到控件的树级别数。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting this property to `2` binds only the root node and any nodes that are immediately under the root node to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将此属性设置为`2`将只有根节点和任何节点到根节点下的绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: All remaining nodes in the data source are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 数据源中的所有剩余节点将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control that the page developer is not displaying.
trans-unit.target: 恶意用户可以创建一个回调请求并获取数据的节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>页开发人员未显示的控件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source.
trans-unit.target: 因此，数据源必须实现的数据的安全。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A> property to hide data.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A>属性来隐藏数据。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A> property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A>属性将仅前两个节点级别 （深度 0 和 1） 绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例为第一个代码示例提供示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A> property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A>属性将仅前两个节点级别 （深度 0 和 1） 绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: All node levels in the data source are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 数据源中的所有节点级别将被都忽略。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须复制此代码示例，到名为 Book.xml 后面提供的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is less than <see langword="-1" />.
trans-unit.target: 选定值小于 <see langword="-1" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the indentation amount (in pixels) for the child nodes of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件的子节点的缩进量（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between a child node's left edge and its parent node's left edge.
trans-unit.target: 子节点的左边缘与其父节点的左边缘之间的间距量（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 20.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 20。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A> property to control the amount of spacing between the left edge of a child node and the left edge of its parent node.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A>属性控制的子节点的左边的缘和其父节点的左边的缘之间的间距大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A> property affects every child node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A>属性会影响中的每个子节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to control the indentation amount of each node individually.
trans-unit.target: 不能分别控制每个节点的缩进量。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A> property to control the indentation of child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A>属性控制的子节点的缩进。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> objects that represents the root nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 对象的集合，它表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中根节点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection" /> that contains the root nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection" />，它包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 中的根节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> property to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> object that contains all the root nodes in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>对象，其中包含在树中的所有根节点。

trans-unit.source: This collection is commonly used to quickly iterate through all the root nodes, or to access a specific root node in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 此集合通常用于快速循环访问所有根节点，或访问林中的某个特定的根节点。

trans-unit.source: A typical tree structure has only one root node; however, you can add multiple root nodes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 典型的树结构只包含一个根节点;但是，你可以添加到多个根节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> property can also be used to manage the root nodes in the tree programmatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>属性还可以用于以编程方式管理在树的根节点。

trans-unit.source: You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加、 插入、 删除和检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>从集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: Any updates to the collection are automatically reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control after the next round trip to the server.
trans-unit.target: 对集合的任何更新会自动反映在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>往返到服务器下一步后的控件。

trans-unit.source: To access the child nodes of a root node, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property of the node.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问根节点的子节点，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property of each subsequent parent-level node to navigate down the node levels.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>的每个后续的父级别节点下的节点级别导航属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> property to traverse the tree.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>遍历树的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> object that allows you to set the default appearance of the nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 对象的引用，该对象用于设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中节点的默认外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> that represents the default style of a node.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 的引用，它表示节点的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property to control the default appearance of a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>属性控制中的节点的默认外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `NodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象 (例如， `NodeStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `NodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `NodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，具体取决于节点类型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding node style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> properties override the style settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的相应节点样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>属性重写的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点，则可以考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>而不是设置单个属性样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>属性来控制中的节点的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text wraps in a node when the node runs out of space.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，它指示空间不足时节点中的文本是否换行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to wrap the text; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要使文本换行，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeWrap%2A> property to specify whether the text that is displayed in each node wraps when it runs out of space.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeWrap%2A>属性指定是否在空间不足时，每个节点中显示的文本换行。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeWrap%2A> property to wrap the text of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeWrap%2A>属性的文本换行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置自定义图像的 URL，该图像用作不可展开节点的指示符。

trans-unit.source: The URL to a custom image to display for non-expandable nodes.
trans-unit.target: 为不可展开节点所显示的自定义图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which displays the default blank image.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这将显示默认的空白图像。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>属性来指定非可展开的节点的指示符的自定义映像。

trans-unit.source: The non-expandable node indicator image (or spacer) is displayed next to leaf nodes (in place of the expandable and collapsible node indicators) to align the leaf nodes with parent or root nodes.
trans-unit.target: 非可展开节点指示器映像 （或分隔） 旁边将显示 （代替可展开和折叠节点指示器中） 的叶节点对齐具有父或根节点的叶节点。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件将显示一个加号 （+）、 减号 （-） 或旁边的节点，以指示节点是否是可展开、 折叠的还是非展开，分别占位符图像。

trans-unit.source: You can specify custom images by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties to the URLs of the custom images.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定由第一个设置自定义映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>属性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后再设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>属性设置为自定义图像的 Url。

trans-unit.source: If no images are specified, the default images are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定任何图像，将使用默认映像。

trans-unit.source: To hide the expansion node indicators, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that nodes align correctly in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保节点中正确对齐<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制使用自定义映像时，请确保指定的所有映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>属性具有相同的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>属性来指定非可展开的节点的指示符的自定义映像。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`.
trans-unit.target: 对于来显示和控件中显示的图像的代码示例中，你必须提供自己的映像和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>属性必须设置为`TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件以引发<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件。

trans-unit.source: It is generally used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> class.
trans-unit.target: 它通常由控件开发人员在扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，一定要调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event is raised when a node is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>中选择节点时，将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating the displayed content, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如更新显示的内容，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>节点指定当选中该节点时引发的事件的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeDataBound%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeDataBound%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，一定要调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" />方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event is raised when a node is expanded in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>中展开节点时将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for a node is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event is also raised when that node is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>节点的属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>在中单击该节点时，也会引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeExpanded%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeExpanded%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeExpanded(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeExpanded(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeExpanded(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，一定要调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeExpanded(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" />方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 有时，它是不可行静态预定义树形结构由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件支持动态节点填充。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>节点的属性设置为`true`，在该节点已展开时的运行时填充该节点。

trans-unit.source: To populate a node dynamically, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for the node to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要动态填充一个节点，请首先设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>到节点的属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Next, define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event that programmatically populates the node.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，定义的事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>以编程方式填充该节点的事件。

trans-unit.source: A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of the node being populated.
trans-unit.target: 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据、 将数据保存到节点结构，并将节点结构<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>节点中填充的集合。

trans-unit.source: A node structure is created by adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of a parent node.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加创建节点结构<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>父节点的集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>节点的属性设置为`true`，节点必须动态填充。

trans-unit.source: You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page.
trans-unit.target: 你不能以声明方式嵌套它; 下面的另一个节点否则，在页上，将会出错。

trans-unit.source: Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population.
trans-unit.target: 支持的浏览器 (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 兼容的浏览器及更高版本) 还可以利用的客户端节点填充。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to populate a node on the client dynamically when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，这将允许<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件动态填充客户端上的节点，展开该节点时，这会阻止需要回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodePopulate%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodePopulate%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodePopulate(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodePopulate(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodePopulate(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，一定要调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodePopulate(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs)" />方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of parent nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 对象的引用，该对象用于设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中父节点的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> that represents the style of the parent nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 的一个引用，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 中父节点的样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>属性来控制中的父节点的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象 (例如， `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，具体取决于节点类型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点，则可以考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>而不是设置单个属性样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>属性来控制中的父节点的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character that is used to delimit the node values that are specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于分隔由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath" /> 属性指定的节点值的字符。

trans-unit.source: The character used to delimit the node values specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 用于分隔在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath" /> 属性中指定的节点值的字符。

trans-unit.source: The default is a slash mark (/).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为斜杠 (/)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property contains a delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>属性包含窗体中的根节点的当前节点的路径的节点值的分隔符分隔列表。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> property to specify the delimiter character that is used to separate the node values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>属性指定的分隔符用于分隔节点值。

trans-unit.source: This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values.
trans-unit.target: 在分析单个值的列表时，通常使用此值。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the text that is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于在显示的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件，分隔符字符可能需要更改以防止任何冲突。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed text should not contain any commas; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property cannot be parsed accurately.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果设置为逗号分隔符字符，显示的文本不能包含任何逗号;否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>属性不能准确地分析。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> property to specify the delimiter character for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property of a node.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>属性指定的分隔符字符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: This value is then used to parse the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property for the individual values.
trans-unit.target: 然后使用此值以分析<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>各个值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates all the nodes based on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 基于数据源创建所有节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is a helper method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to bind the specified data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法是由调用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件绑定到控件的指定的数据源。

trans-unit.source: Because the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" /> method is sealed, you should override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PerformDataBinding" /> method, if you need to perform any additional tasks when binding data.
trans-unit.target: 因为<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" />方法都密封的则应重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PerformDataBinding" />方法时，如果你需要在绑定数据时执行的任何其他任务。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether node data is populated on demand from the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，它指示是否按需从客户端填充节点数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to populate tree node data on demand from the client; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要按需从客户端填充树节点数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 有时，它是不可行静态预定义树形结构由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件支持动态节点填充。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>节点的属性设置为`true`，在该节点已展开时的运行时填充该节点。

trans-unit.source: In addition to populating nodes on demand, it is possible to populate the nodes directly on a supported client browser.
trans-unit.target: 除了填充按需的节点，则可以填充直接上支持的客户端浏览器的节点。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A> property is set to `true`, a service is called from the client to populate the tree nodes, which eliminates the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>属性设置为`true`，从客户端来填充树节点中，而不需要将回发到服务器调用服务。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control posts back to the server to populate the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件回发到服务器以填充节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A> property must also be set to `true` in order for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A> property to be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A>属性还必须设置为`true`顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: To populate a node on the client, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A> property to `true` and then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for the node to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要填充客户端上的节点，请首先设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>属性`true`然后设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>到节点的属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Next, define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event that programmatically populates the node.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，定义的事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>以编程方式填充该节点的事件。

trans-unit.source: A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of the node being populated.
trans-unit.target: 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据、 将数据保存到节点结构，并将节点结构<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>节点中填充的集合。

trans-unit.source: You create a node structure by adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of a parent node.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加创建节点结构<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>父节点的集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>节点的属性设置为`true`，节点必须动态填充。

trans-unit.source: You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page.
trans-unit.target: 你不能以声明方式嵌套它; 下面的另一个节点否则，在页上，将会出错。

trans-unit.source: The client-side node population feature is supported in browsers that support callback scripts.
trans-unit.target: 在浏览器支持回调脚本中支持的客户端节点填充功能。

trans-unit.source: To check whether a browser supports callback scripts access, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查浏览器是否支持回调脚本访问，请使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>类。

trans-unit.source: You can access the instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class for the current request through the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以访问的实例<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>通过当前请求的类<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A> property to enable client-side population of the nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>属性来启用客户端中的节点填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that when client-side node population is enabled, nodes are populated dynamically on the client, without the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，启用客户端节点填充后，节点会自动填充客户端，而无需回发到服务器上。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 表示要传递到事件处理程序的可选事件自变量的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Raises the callback event using the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定参数引发回调事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method is a helper method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> 方法是 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> 方法的帮助器方法。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 表示要传递到事件处理程序的可选事件自变量的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control to process an event that is raised when a form is posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 启用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件以处理将窗体发送到服务器时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" /> method is a helper method for the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System#Web#UI#ICallbackEventHandler#RaiseCallbackEvent(System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" /> 方法是 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System#Web#UI#ICallbackEventHandler#RaiseCallbackEvent(System.String)" /> 方法的帮助器方法。

trans-unit.source: The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method of the control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 页的值传递`eventArgument`参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法实现的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control also renders the HTML element that causes the postback event to occur.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件还会呈现导致回发事件发生的 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: If the control renders client-side script to post back to the server, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件呈现回发到服务器的客户端脚本，将从脚本的自变量传递中`eventArgument`参数。

trans-unit.source: If the postback event is caused by a simple submit to the server, the `eventArgument` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果回发事件由一个简单提交到服务器，`eventArgument`参数是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method provides the functionality for many events that are implemented by HTML and Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法提供的功能对于由 HTML 和 Web 服务器控件实现的很多事件。

trans-unit.source: Signals the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件发出信号，以通知 ASP.NET 应用程序该控件的状态已更改。

trans-unit.source: Change events for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control are raised from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 更改事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件引发从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: 表示在客户端上呈现 HTML 内容的输出流的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the HTML opening tag of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 将控件的 HTML 开始标记呈现到指定的编写器中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderBeginTag%2A> method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderBeginTag%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream used to write content to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，表示用于向网页写入内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Renders the nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 呈现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中的节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderContents%2A> method to render the nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to the client.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderContents%2A>方法呈现中的节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>到客户端的控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: 表示在客户端上呈现 HTML 内容的输出流的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the HTML closing tag of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 将控件的 HTML 结束标记呈现到指定的编写器中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderEndTag%2A> method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderEndTag%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the root node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 对象的引用，该对象用于设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中根节点的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> that represents the style of the root node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 的一个引用，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 中根节点的样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the root node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>属性来控制中的根节点的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象 (例如， `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，具体取决于节点类型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点，则可以考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>而不是设置单个属性样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the root node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>属性来控制中的根节点的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 保存 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件的状态。

trans-unit.source: The server control's current view state; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if there is no view state associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件的当前视图状态；否则，如果没有与该控件相关联的视图状态，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object that represents the selected node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 控件中选定节点的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> that represents the selected node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />，它表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 中的选定节点。

trans-unit.source: The text of a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode.
trans-unit.target: 中的节点的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件可以在两种模式之一中： 选择模式和导航模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, a node is in selection mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。

trans-unit.source: To put a node into navigation mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for the node to a value other than an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要将节点放入导航模式下，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性为空字符串以外的值的节点 ("")。

trans-unit.source: To put a node into selection mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for the node to empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要使一个节点处于选择模式，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性节点为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When a node is in selection mode, the user can select a node by clicking on the text in the node.
trans-unit.target: 当节点处于选择模式时，用户可以通过单击的节点中的文本选择的节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property to determine which node is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>属性来确定哪个节点选择中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: A node cannot be selected when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 节点不能选择何时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件显示超链接。

trans-unit.source: When hyperlinks are displayed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 当显示超链接时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>属性始终返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a different node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control by clicking the text in the new node, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event is raised, by default.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择中的其他节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>通过单击中的新节点的文本控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>引发事件时，默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a different event by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for the property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置指定一个不同的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的选项。

trans-unit.source: Selection action
trans-unit.target: 选择操作

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 切换展开和折叠状态之间的节点。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>事件，根据需要。

trans-unit.source: Raises no events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选定节点时不引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选定节点时引发 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选定节点时引发 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 和 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> 两个事件。

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>的节点不呈现其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property to determine the value of the selected node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>属性来确定在所选节点的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a node is selected in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中选定某个节点时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event is raised when a node is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>中选择节点时，将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating the displayed content, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如更新显示的内容，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>节点以指定在选择该节点时引发的事件的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的选项。

trans-unit.source: Selection action
trans-unit.target: 选择操作

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 切换展开和折叠状态之间的节点。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>事件，根据需要。

trans-unit.source: Raises no events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选定节点时不引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选定节点时引发 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选定节点时引发 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 和 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> 两个事件。

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>的节点不呈现其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event is fired only on post back when a user clicks a node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>用户单击节点时，仅在开机自检上激发事件。

trans-unit.source: The event is not fired if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property is changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果不激发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>属性以编程方式更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event to update a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control when a node is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>事件以更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制节点中的选中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> object that controls the appearance of the selected node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 对象，该对象控制 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中选定节点的外观。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> that represents the style of the selected node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" />，它表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中选定节点的样式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，表示未设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the selected node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>属性来控制在所选节点的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `SelectedNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象 (例如， `SelectedNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SelectedNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SelectedNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，具体取决于节点类型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the selected node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>属性来控制在所选节点的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: 获取选定节点的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: 选定节点的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> property provides a convenient way to determine the value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A>属性提供了一种方便的方法来确定所选节点的值。

trans-unit.source: This property simply returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that is referred to by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只是返回的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>由所引用的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If no node is currently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, an empty string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果不到任何节点中当前选定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制，空字符串 ("") 返回。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set the node as data-bound; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将节点设置为被数据绑定，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Allows a derived class to set whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 允许派生类设置指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 控件是否被数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataBound%2A> method to indicate whether the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataBound%2A>方法，以指示是否指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>是数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode,System.Boolean)" /> method is provided to allow a control that is derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control to set the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataBound" /> property on a node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode,System.Boolean)" />提供方法以允许控件派生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />控件设置<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataBound" />节点上的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The data item for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 的数据项。

trans-unit.source: Allows a derived class to set the data item for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 允许派生类为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 控件设置数据项。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataItem%2A> method to specify the data item for the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataItem%2A>方法，以指定指定的数据项目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The data path for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 的数据项。

trans-unit.source: Allows a derived class to set the data path for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 允许派生类为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 控件设置数据路径。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataPath%2A> method to set the data path for the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataPath%2A>方法以设置指定的数据路径<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating which node types will display a check box in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，它指示哪些节点类型将在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="TreeNodeType.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="TreeNodeType.None" />。

trans-unit.source: To provide multi-node selection support in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, you can display check boxes next to the image for a node.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供中的多节点选择支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件，可以显示节点的映像旁边的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property to specify which node types will display a check box.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>属性以指定哪些节点类型将显示一个复选框。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is set to `TreeNodeType.Parent`, check boxes are displayed for each parent node in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果此属性设置为`TreeNodeType.Parent`，每个父节点在树中显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid values for this property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了此属性的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Node type
trans-unit.target: 节点类型

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Check boxes are displayed for all nodes.
trans-unit.target: 所有节点显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: Check boxes are displayed for all leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有叶节点显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: Check boxes are not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 不显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: Check boxes are displayed for all parent nodes.
trans-unit.target: 显示所有父节点的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Check boxes are displayed for all root nodes.
trans-unit.target: 为所有根节点显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration type that is used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property is a flag enumeration, which allows you to combine values through bitwise operations.
trans-unit.target: 用于枚举类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>属性是标志枚举，该对话框可以通过按位运算组合值。

trans-unit.source: For example, to display check boxes for the parent and leaf nodes, use the bitwise OR operator to combine the `TreeNodeType.Parent` and `TreeNodeType.Leaf` values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显示父节点和叶节点的复选框，用于按位 OR 运算符合并`TreeNodeType.Parent`和`TreeNodeType.Leaf`值。

trans-unit.source: To determine which nodes have their check box selected, iterate through the nodes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定哪个节点拥有其复选框选择，循环访问的节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> setting by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property for each node.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>设置通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>每个节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: If you need to provide only single-selection support, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要提供仅单选支持，请考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property to show and hide the check boxes for the different node types.
